changelog.name: Translucence

version.releaseNotes: This release refactors theme functions to better conform to WordPress theme development standards.
version.change: updated how theme options css is added to template such that wp_head function is now used.
added more theme options input validation.
updated theme options form to use WordPress Settings API.
changed name of theme options pages to "Theme Options".
reimplemented how theme options are saved so that all options now save in single array.
updated all theme functions so they are prefixed with theme name.
separated functions for managing theme options from those used in template files.

version.releaseNotes: This release refines the toggle and display of site page links and sidebar and include general bug fixes.
version.fix: Fixed header color theme option default values.
version.new: redesigned and repositioned sidebar toggle links for better use of viewport
version.change: moved listing of related and sub pages from before page content to after page content
added gray blue and black to header color theme options.
increased size of top margin on sidebars to they displaying lower than content area.
version.fix: Fixed default page template so that hidden sidebars are not displayed.

version.releaseNotes: This release refactors functions developed in ShadowBox as applied to Twentyten theme template files. New features include navigation elements in page templates, toggle display of sidebars, css for hiding all but current page sub-pages in pages widget. Css has been standardized for most 'boxes' in templates including sidebars, content, header, top navigation, category and tag links. Finally theme options UI have been redesigned with various options modes to simply the display of options and improve WYSIWIG.
version.change: added options css for max-width of images in posts based on content_width;
Updated options for box css such that low-opacity boxes get less opaque on hover.
version.new: added list of sub-pages or related pages to all page templates
added support for custom page images (i.e. featured image)
added breadcrumb links to all page templates
updated css for page, menu and category widgets so that current page, menu-item and category are highlighted and child-pages and sub-menus are hidden for all except current pages and menu-items
added theme model UI options mode with various option sets to simplify theme model
added links to custom header and custom background in theme model
added box-shadow theme option for adding a drop shadow around box (like ShadowBox theme)
version.change: Created options-css.php file for css that is generated by theme options.
version.new: Created theme option for limiting which options get displayed in the theme model.
Created template-options.php file with a theme_model function that includes all code related to displaying theme options UI within a model of the theme (based on actual template markup).
Added option for boxes around site title and tagline so these could be displayed on top and any image and still be legible.
Added Translucence draft variation.
version.change: Updated css for category and tag links to use same options as sidebars, header, footer etc.
version.new: Added option for setting size of entry text

version.releaseNotes: This release adds most of the theme options and design elements of the ShadowBox theme to the Twentyten theme as well as adds new options not in its predessesor such as site-title, size and color and spacing between menu bar and main content area.
version.new: Theme options: added option for setting distance between menu bar main content area
Added support for configuring preset widgets
Created page templates with various configurations of sidebar display
Templates: added profile info to authors template.
Templates: added feed links to home, single, category, tag, author template files.
Theme options: added options for setting the site title size, color, shadow offset and blur. Also added options for setting the site tag line color and size
Theme options: added options for site wrapper color, opacity and border
Added primary and secondary sidebar template files so that theme options can specify which sidebars to display for various post and page templates
Updated 2010 to include Translucence theme options

version.releaseNotes: This release is no different from WordPress twentyten v1.1. Future versions of this theme will include theme options for adjusting the color and opacity of various areas of theme layout
version.new: WordPress twentyten v1.1 to be transformed into 2010 Translucence

changelog.about: Translucence is a customizable, flexible and extensible theme for WordPress based on the WordPress twentyten default theme
